welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sonsbeck, Germany! Known for its quaint charm and rich history, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or a login.
